name: BeardedDragonFacts
0:
”Alexa start Bearded Dragon Facts”
”Alexa launch Bearded Dragon Facts”
”Alexa open Bearded Dragon Facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bearded dragon facts
des:
Planet Earth is abundant with various animal species, some of which are a joy to keep as pets. Bearded dragons have become one of the most popular household pets in the U.S. Their intelligence, unique name, and wild appearance makes them especially attractive to people looking for a relatively easy to care for, exotic pet. 
 
If you own a bearded dragon or are planning to, you may not have all the facts about this lovely reptile in terms of its physical structure, wellness, and temperament. For that, this Alexa Skill shares fascinating and fun facts about bearded dragons from leading wildlife publications that you may not have known about your scaly friend.
 
You can activate the skill by saying: 
 
“Alexa, ask Bearded Dragon Facts to tell me a fact” or
“Alexa, tell me Bearded Dragon Facts”.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
